overview.title: Precision Care for Complex Hip Pain
overview.content: We begin with MRI review, ultrasound assessment, and gait analysis. Depending on cartilage status and pathology we recommend PRP, BMAC, adipose cell therapy, or peri-tendinous injections. Each plan includes gluteal activation training and movement coaching so you recover stronger than before.
highlights: Targets osteoarthritis, labral tears, bursitis, and gluteal tendinopathy
Ultrasound-guided delivery into joint capsule or tendon sheath
Rehab designed for walkers, cyclists, and athletes

faq.question: How soon can I bear weight?
faq.answer: You can walk out of clinic. We advise 48 hours of reduced impact before returning to normal activity.

faq.question: Will this replace surgery?
faq.answer: Our aim is to delay or avoid replacements. Some patients still choose surgery later with better strength and less pain.
